My boy is lucky because the teacher cares about him so much! The teacher helped him in the transition from hating school to loving it. Now he‚Äôs like a ‚Äúschool ambassador‚Äù welcoming to the new kids and parents to the schoolü§£.

The teacher has resigned to pursue her degree in early childhood education. Happy for her to advance studies and follow her passion, wishing her all the best‚Ä¶!

I am extremely satisfied with the quality of education and care provided by Small Wonder Jurong West. The curriculum is well-structured and engaging, allowing my child to learn and grow in a nurturing environment.

The teachers are exceptional! They are dedicated, passionate, and take a genuine interest in each child's development. Their kindness, patience, and guidance have made a significant positive impact on my child's learning journey.

The principal is also commendable. Their leadership and vision have created a supportive and inclusive community within the school. They are approachable, receptive to feedback, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure the well-being of students and parents alike.

Overall, I am impressed with the high standards and dedication of the entire team at Small Wonder Jurong West. They truly deserve accolades for their hard work and commitment to providing an exceptional educational experience for young minds. Keep up the fantastic work!

Very touched by the staff and teachers, esp teacher Irene, aunty Teng and aunty Yap. My son, Aidan, was so well taken care of that when I transferred him to another childcare ctr due to our relocation, I had to 'quarantine' him at home for the last 2 weeks so that he wont be traumatised when he goes to his new childcare ctr. N thanks aunty Teng for your farewell gift to him. Thx alot!
